titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Commissioning Data Set Versions - Description

div.p: Listed below are the Commissioning Data Set versions since 2001.
November 2012: CDS Version 6-2 Type List (updated October 2017 to support CDS Version 6-2-1 and April 2019 to support CDS Version 6-2-2)

li.p: April 2005 to March 2008: CDS Version NHS005 Type List
April 2001 to March 2005: CDS Version NHS003 and 4 Type List

div.p: The XML Schemas and supporting information can be downloaded from Technology Reference Data Update Distribution (TRUD) at: NHS Data Model and Dictionary: DD XML Schemas.
